typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		beer_ABV as double,
		beer_beerId as integer,
		beer_brewerId as integer,
		beer_name as string,
		beer_style as string,
		review_appearance as double,
		review_palette as double,
		review_overall as double,
		review_taste as double,
		review_profileName as string,
		review_aroma as double,
		review_time as integer,
		review_text as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		beer_beerId,
		beer_name,
		review_overall,
		review_profileName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(beer_beerId),
	BeerId_count = count()) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 rank(desc(BeerId_count, true),
	output(BeerID_Rank as long),
	dense: true) ~> Rank1
Select1, Rank1 join(Select1@beer_beerId == Aggregate1@beer_beerId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		beername = beer_name,
		rating = review_overall,
		user = review_profileName,
		beer_beerId = Aggregate1@beer_beerId,
		BeerId_count,
		BeerID_Rank
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 filter(BeerID_Rank<100) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(asc(BeerID_Rank, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'BeerCleaned[n].csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ReducedcolumnbeerDB
